iterations.yara_rule:
rule Bypass_Sample {
    meta:
        description = "Evasion bypass rules targeting ExitProcess calls"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? }  // Example pattern for first ExitProcess call
        $pattern1 = { ?? ?? ?? ?? ?? ?? } // Another unique pattern from the trace data
        $pattern2 = { 6A ?? ?? ?? ?? }   // Third distinct pattern based on different instruction sequence

    condition:
        any of them
}

new_signature_details.name: packer_unknown_pe_section_name
new_signature_details.description: The binary contains an unknown PE section name indicative of packing

new_signature_details.name: contains_pe_overlay
new_signature_details.description: The PE file contains an overlay

data.overlay: Contains overlay at offset 0x0000a200 with size: 694784 bytes

new_signature_details.name: binary_yara
new_signature_details.description: Binary file triggered multiple YARA rules
